title: GPU Architectural Modeling Engineer
description: Functional and performance modeling of the latest and greatest Apple GPUs.

title: MS in Electrical and Computer Engineering
description: As a grad student at UCSD, specialized in Computer Engineering and took courses in computer architecture, GPU programming, and digital design.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Part of Corporate and Investment Banking, spearheaded the development of an automation tool for .NET Framework to Core migration, achieving a 95% reduction in migration times using static code analysis

title: LFX Mentee at Move2Kube
description: As part of the Linux Foundation's Mentorship Program, made improvements to Move2Kube: a CLI tool assisting migration and onboarding to Kubernetes.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Assisted in deployment, debugging, and writing Kubernetes manifests for the WMDM team in the document management space.

title: Co-Founder
description: Co-founded Team Quark, an innovative technical club focused on fostering a collaborative technical environment at VIT Pune, giving our members the freedom and encouragement to explore new technologies and paradigms. Hosted events and workshops such as Envision, attended by over 200 people.

title: Winner
description: Part of the winning team at JPMorgan's Code for Good Hackathon (2022). This lead to 2 internships and a job offer at the company.

title: Winner
description: Lead the winning team in the Ingenious hackathon at VIT Pune, achieving the top position among 100 participating teams from across the nation.

title: B.Tech in Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering
description: Graduated with a CGPA of 8.9 from VIT, Pune, with a departmental rank of 5/304. Took courses in data structures, algorithms, computer architecture, operating systems, and embedded systems.
